snippet: Nuns at a monastery in Cascia, Italy, are doing brisk business running a secondhand wedding gown depot as brides-to-be try to keep costs down.
abstract: Cascia Journal; nuns at St Rita monastery in Cascia, Italy, operate secondhand wedding dress depot; unlikely atelier, once frequented by poor women, has become trendy choice for growing numbers of cost-conscious brides as country continues to suffer recession.
lead_paragraph: Nuns at a monastery in Cascia, Italy, are doing brisk business running a secondhand wedding gown depot as brides-to-be try to keep costs down.

headline.print_headline: Monastery Becomes Fashion Destination for Brides in a Frugal Era
headline.main: An Italian Monastery Becomes a Fashion Destination for Brides in a Frugal Era
